EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email sent to PM when GM Approves Progress Report
EmailTemplate.name: Progress Report GM Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Progress Report {!ProgressReports__c.Name} has been Approved.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ProgressReports__c.ProgramApprover__c},
This email is to notify you that the Grant Monitor has approved the Progress Report {!ProgressReports__c.Name} and is ready for your review.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
